SocialMedia_Logic

Class SocialMediaLogicImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • SocialMedia_Logic.SocialMediaLogicImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, SocialMediaLogic

    public class SocialMediaLogicImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements SocialMediaLogic
    Implementation class for the SocialMediaLogic which handles all actions
    Author:
    Sebastian
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
